text: Daniel Alejandro Rendón Ayala (born November 8, 1991 in Guadalajara, Jalisco) is a professional Mexican footballer who currently plays for Alebrijes de Oaxaca. ==External links== * ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:Club Atlético Zacatepec players Category:Alebrijes de Oaxaca players Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Liga Premier de México players Category:Footballers from Jalisco Category:Sportspeople from Guadalajara, Jalisco Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Daniel Rendón
